name: Need for Electricity
description:
Need for Electricity

You are a robot that needs energy to keep moving. But there is a catch. If you get overcharged you die too. Also your energy depletes as the time goes on. You need to be "CLOSE ENOUGH" to the outlets to win.

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

A game by BruhZone

Game Developer - Kerem Can Akdag (Glomerulust)

Game Designer - Atakan Sec (SwiftSloth)
